I testified in @HouseVetAffairs today in support of my Fallen Warrior Battlefield Cross Memorial Act to protect battlefield cross memorials in our national cemeteries. This issue has been championed by #NortheastOhio veterans. Watch my testimony below for more: pic.twitter.com/wADDiIc0sy
I send out updates on my work in Congress every Sunday. Subscribe to my Weekly Huddle newsletter here: https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/contact/subscribe.htm …

Disappointed to see Nancy Pelosi block a vote on the resolution to censure @repadamschiff last night.  Impeachment is an incredibly solemn act and not something that should be undertaken in secret or with a partisan bias. The lack of transparency we have seen is unacceptable.

This week I introduced a bill to combat the growing suicide rate, implored my colleagues to fight online child exploitation, and helped secure nearly $1 million in federal grant dollars for #NortheastOhio organizations. More in my #WeeklyRundown here: https://youtu.be/SlzxdwzzXko

My office was also part of securing $750,000 grant dollars for #OH16 this week aimed at fighting domestic violence. @DVPIorg and OneEighty, Inc. will both receive funds to support their transitional housing programs. More on that here: https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=137 …

Additionally, a $41,700 grant for The Turn will support their program providing free golf-oriented physical therapy opportunities in #NorthOlmsted for more than 200 participants annually with a range of physical disabilities including amputees, TBI and visual impairments.

Thanks to a $158,641.25 grant, Adaptive Sports Program of Ohio (and former #FeaturedConstituent Lisa Followay) will be able to launch a new year-round adaptive sports program for veterans with physical and visual disabilities in the #Cleveland metro area.

Proud to share that my office has helped to secure over $200,000 federal dollars this week for #OH16 businesses seeking to serve Northeast Ohio's wounded warriors. More here: https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=136 …

Members of Detachment 2, Company C, 3-238th General Support Aviation Battalion held their call to duty ceremony at @MAPSAirMuseum yesterday before deploying to southwest Asia. Thank you all for your commitment to our country. We look forward to having you back home soon! pic.twitter.com/slPmkCwRE3
My heart goes out to the family of Rep. Elijah Cummings today. Elijah was a dedicated representative of his district and an inspiration to many. He will be dearly missed.

A bipartisan group of my colleagues and I are calling for the committees of jurisdiction on this issue (@HouseJudiciary, @HomelandDems) to hold a hearing on this issue so we can examine current shortcomings and find new policy solutions. Our letter here: https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=135 …

The @nytimes report on online child exploitation lays out horrific facts that demand action. We must address shortcomings in our laws & put forth innovative solutions, including using new tech, to protect our kids and keep this content off the internet. https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2019/09/28/us/child-sex-abuse.html …

Research on the causes of suicide attempts is badly needed to help us get at the roots of this crisis. This effects everyone - from veterans to children facing effects of social media. If you or a friend is in crisis, please call the suicide prevention lifeline at 1-800-273-8255

Suicide is a growing problem with 22 veteran suicides each day nationwide & an 80% increase in the suicide rate for kids under 14 in #Ohio since 2008. Today I introduced the Advancing Research to Prevent Suicide Act to take action to reverse this trend. https://anthonygonzalez.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=133 …
Happy to see progress made in the China trade talks. Looking forward to supporting @realdonaldtrump as we crack down on IP theft, currency, and many other issues going forward.

The US should not engage in endless foreign wars, but we also should not desert our staunchest allies. Turkey's attacks against the Kurds threaten our victory over ISIS & the protection of our homeland. We must stand by those who have fought beside us as we bring our troops home.

Better late than never... due to technical difficulties, last week's #WeeklyRundown has just arrived. It was manufacturing week last week and I spent time in and around #OH16 talking workforce development, #JOBSAct, and #USMCA. More in my video here: https://youtu.be/TAobr3DKgnQ

It is #manufacturing day today and I spent part of the morning at the Made in #Medina manufacturing expo talking to over 60 of our local manufacturing business about what we need on the federal level to keep Ohio jobs and companies growing. My #JOBSAct is a part of that. pic.twitter.com/fwmx1uMO8R

This is a major problem we're facing in Northeast Ohio's manufacturing sector right now. We need to connect our workforce with the right skills for these jobs, which is why @senrobportman and I introduced the #JOBSAct.
